casebody.data:
WILLIAM H. GARNER v. DARIUS R. MANGAM, et al.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Freedman and .Truax, JJ,

Decided May 2, 1881. Exceptions ordered to be heard at general term in the first instance. James 8. Or eves, attorney, and Alexander Thain7 of counsel, for plaintiff. Huntley & Bower, Ernest T. Fellowes, and Richard H. Huntley, for defendants. Truax, J.,

wrote for judgment on the verdict for plaintiff; exceptions overruled ; Sedgwick, Ch. J.. and Freedman, J., concurred.
